member.name: M:Text_Speech.Controllers.TextController.Post(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: To convert a text image into an Audio File.The text image can either be in jpeg or png

member.name: T:Text_Speech.MimeTypes
member.summary: Provides utilities for mapping file names and extensions to MIME-types.

member.name: P:Text_Speech.MimeTypes.FallbackMimeType
member.summary: The fallback MIME-type. Defaults to application/octet-stream.

member.name: M:Text_Speech.MimeTypes.GetMimeTypeExtensions(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to fetch all available file extensions for a MIME-type.
member.returns: All available extensions for the given MIME-type

member.name: M:Text_Speech.MimeTypes.TryGetMimeType(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Tries to get the MIME-type for the given file name.
member.param: The MIME-type for the given file name.
member.returns: true if a MIME-type was found, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Text_Speech.MimeTypes.GetMimeType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the MIME-type for the given file name, or if a mapping doesn't exist.
member.returns: The MIME-type for the given file name.
